name: Le Signal / Tide of the century collection  - 4/6 curtains: Merci
description:
Le Signal / Tide of the century is a collection of 6 videos GIF from a video projection onto the building Le Signal, from 5.34am until sunrise, for the Tide of the Century, in 21 March 2015. 


———————————

Format : GIF
Resolution: 1920x1080 pixels 
Loop duration : 40" 

———————————

Le Signal, built in 1967 in Soulac-sur-Mer, in France, is under threat from erosion. On 8th December 2014, an municipal order obliged all the residents to permanently evacuate their apartments. Once abandoned, the building was vandalised.
Since December 2014, my work on Le Signal has incorporated several installations, drawing inspiration from successive events, scientific data collected and the building’s progressive deterioration. This project will end with the destruction of Le Signal, in 2022. 

———————————
